bilingual.source: I must get an Internet connection,' said Ibrahim.
bilingual.target: 易卜拉欣说：“我必须获得互联网连接。”
这个网络连接很快速的。

bilingual.source: The interconnecting cables ensure a stable internet connection.
bilingual.target: 互相连接的电缆确保了稳定的互联网连接。

bilingual.source: The connection cable needs to be replaced.

bilingual.target: 今天的网络连接很缓慢。
这款音箱支持无线连接。
这里的网络连接不可靠。
无线网络是一种常见的连接方式。

list.abstract: connection（ [kəˈnekʃn]），英语单词，作名词用，为联系；关系；卫理公会团体。短语搭配有establish connection（建立连接）。例句为“Because your brain works by connection.（因为你的大脑通过连接工作。）” connection名词类近义词有relationship、bearing、link等，相关反义词有unconnectedness、disconnectedness。connection为可数单词，复数为connections。
《Connection》是美国歌手OneRepublic演唱的歌曲。收录在OneRepublic2018年6月26日发行的专辑《Connection》中。

yingyinNormal.en: I want the connection, the excitement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想要那种连接关系，兴奋感。

yingyinNormal.en: Han, don't blow this, it might be our only connection ever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿憨，别搞砸我们这辈子唯一有可能有的共同点了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, the connection between marriage and money is nothing new.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实婚姻和金钱的联系，早在过去便如此。

yingyinNormal.en: There's a connection between you. Listen to you. You sound ludicrous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们之间有联系。听听你，荒唐至极。

yingyinNormal.en: You're watching French gay porn, I hope. Wi-Fi connection's not strong enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望你不是在看法国同志小黄片。这里的无线网信号不太好。

yingyinNormal.en: And then the aliens came. And we made the connection. It's what they're made of.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外星人来了之后，我们才发现其中关联，这是变形金刚的基本元素。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd also get your own penthouse apartment in Columbus with the highest-speed connection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还能在哥伦布有套你自己的顶楼公寓配备最高网速。

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetie, we have a bad connection. I can't hear you so well. What did you say about memory?
yingyinNormal.zh: 宝贝，讯号不好，我听不太清楚，你是说什么记忆？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Oh, yeah. And I mean, the connection, I mean you know, emotionally, mentally, physically.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那四次约会棒到不行，我们好契合情感上，心灵上，肉体上。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you make Claire laugh? We have a connection. Yeah. I make her laugh. I make her feel desired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把克莱尔也逗笑了吗？我们有共鸣，是的，我也让她笑了，让她有被渴望的感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: My connection is making us wait. It's just a negotiation tactic. Trust me, this is my specialty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的客户要我们等。这只是谈判策略，刚好是我的专长。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so what is the connection? All we know is that they are all members of the predator family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，那有什么联系呢？我们只知道他们都是食肉动物。

yingyinNormal.en: Barkawi, sells arms to dummy companies. Some of them probably in London. Find a connection to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴卡维以假公司的名义出售武器，有的可能就在伦敦，找到他们的联系。

yingyinNormal.en: How did she find that out? She's been chasing human traffickers, ones with connection to the Shop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她怎么发现的？她在追踪和"商店"勾结的人贩子。

yingyinNormal.en: I need you to clean up your mess, Bernard, any connection that ties us to Theresa's untimely demise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要你去收拾你的烂摊子，伯纳德，所有与我们杀死特蕾莎相关的记录，都必须删除。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Oh, dear. We seem to have lost the connection. How have you done this? How is any of this possible?
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂。天啊。通话好像中断了呢。你怎么做到的？这怎么可能？

yingyinNormal.en: None of the YouCast users Margot interacted with have a connection to her disappearance. Even fish_n_chips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛戈接触过的"换你了"直播网站用户中没有人与她的失踪有联系。甚至f...甚至fish_n_chips也没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Our want of connection? Mr. Bingley didn't seem to vex himself about that. No, It was more than that. How, sir?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对社交的渴求？不，比那更甚。怎样更甚，先生？

yingyinNormal.en: How, Cooper? Love, TARS, love. It's just like Brand said. My connection with Murph, it is quantifiable. It's the key.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么找呢，Cooper？爱呀，TARS，用爱，就像Brand说的，我与Murph的联系是可以量化的，这关系就是关键。

yingyinNormal.en: Not one of them carried the Celestial genes. Until you, Peter. Out of all my spawn only you carry the connection to the light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们没一个人身上有天神族的基因。直到你的出生，彼得。在我这么多后代中只有你身上散发着神力之光。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We tend to think that friends and family members are our biggest sources of <highlight>connection</highlight>, laughter, and warmth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们倾向于认为朋友和家人是我们联系、欢笑和温暖的最大来源。

examination_example.sentence: It is really important to understand and try and tease out what is the human <highlight>connection</highlight> with fire today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理解并试图梳理出如今人类与火的联系，这真的很重要。

examination_example.sentence: Thinking is essentially a process of making <highlight>connections</highlight> in the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 思考本质上是一个在大脑中建立联系的过程。

sense_info_list.en: the action of linking one thing with another

examination_example.sentence: The cable and phone companies selling broadband <highlight>connections</highlight> had the power and incentive to favor affiliated websites over their rivals'.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 销售宽带连接的有线电视和电话公司有权力和动机支持附属网站而不是竞争对手的网站。

sense_info_list.en: people with whom one has social or professional contact, especially those with influence and able to offer one help

word_usage.usage:
in connection with sb./sth.表示”与……有关（或相关），如：
I am writing to you in connection with your recent job application.
我写此信与你最近求职一事有关。

connection表示“联系；关联”时，为可数名词；“与某事有联系”常与介词with搭配，如：
He had no connection with the security forces.
他与安全部队没有关系。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Some suggest that women's immune systems benefit from their tendency to prioritize and nurture social <highlight>connections</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人认为，女性的免疫系统得益于她们优先考虑和培养社会联系的倾向。

examination_example.sentence: Because of his long-time <highlight>connection</highlight> with people in power, Marconi was unable to cut himself off from the fascist regime in Italy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于长期以来与当权者的联系，马可尼无法与意大利的法西斯政权割裂开来。

examination_example.sentence: There is a direct <highlight>connection</highlight> from Marconi to today's social media, search engines, and program streaming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi与当今的社交媒体、搜索引擎和节目流媒体播放有着直接的联系。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I believe we have less <highlight>connection</highlight> with the value of our money when we just tap the "Approve" buttons on our phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我相信，当我们只需点击手机上的“批准”按钮时，我们与金钱的价值就没有那么紧密的关联了。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>connection</highlight> happens not only by means of collaborative development, review and testing, but also at conferences where faculty regularly decide on their textbooks and curricula for the coming year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种联系不仅仅是通过协作开发、审查和测试得以实现，更是在教职人员通常召开的决定来年使用何种教材、开设何种课程的会议上体现出来。

examination_example.sentence: Project-based learning has grown in popularity with teachers and administrators. However, project-based learning is not making. Although there is a <highlight>connection</highlight>, there is also a distinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于项目的学习法在教师和管理人员中越来越受欢迎。然而，项目学习法并不是创造。二者虽然有联系，但也有区别。

sense_info_list.en: people with whom one has social or professional contact; especially those with influence and able to offer one help

examination_example.sentence: But if you're struggling with real boredom and the emptiness it provokes, consider whether you might seek new <highlight>connections</highlight> and more significant challenges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果你正与真正的无聊以及其引发的空虚作斗争，考虑一下你是否可以寻求新的人脉和更大的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: It may be an obstacle to expanding one's <highlight>connections</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能是扩展一个人的人脉的障碍。

examination_example.sentence: Our always-on world of social media may result in more <highlight>connections</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在线的社交媒体世界可能会带来更广的人脉。

sense_info_list.en: the action of linking one thing with another
a train; bus or plane at a station or an airport that a passenger can take soon after getting off another in order to continue their journey
sense_info_list.zh: 转车; 转机; 联运

examination_example.sentence: And an error occurred during the <highlight>connections</highlight> in Denver.We have notified our customers that their pets arrived safely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在丹佛的联运过程中出现了一个错误。我们已经通知了客户，他们的宠物已经安全到达。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
